attributes.action: Ensure that the Accident and Emergency in Burton on Trent remains open
attributes.background: There have been moves to close the critical accident and emergency department at Burton on Trent. This department is vital and to close it would add additional pressure on Derby and Stoke who are already overstretched and add additional response time for critically ill patients.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

This would be a decision of the Burton Hospitals NHS Foundation Trust. You can find out how to contact the Trust here:

https://www.uhdb.nhs.uk/contact-us
